title: Resident Evil Director's Cut (Custom for Xperia Play)
description:
RESIDENT EVIL DIRECTOR'S CUT

Custom game for the sony ericsom Xperia Play

Instructions:

1- Copy the file com.sony.playstation.SLUS_00747.apk to anywhere on the sd card of your Xperia Play.

2- Copy the folder named com.sony.playstation.SLUS_00747 to your sd card Android/data folder.

3- On your Xperia Play, install the game using the file com.sony.playstation.SLUS_00747.apk.

- Works perfectly on Xperia Play with Android 2.3.4

Enjoy.		

-------------------- BY GIOLUCCA85 --------------------
